member.name: FSBANK_SUBSOUND
member.summary: Representation of how to encode a single subsound in the final FSB.

member.name: FSBANK_SUBSOUND.fileNames
member.summary: List of file names (instead of FSBANK_SUBSOUND::fileData) used to produce an interleaved sound.

member.name: FSBANK_SUBSOUND.fileData
member.summary: List of file data pointers (instead of FSBANK_SUBSOUND::fileNames) used to produce an interleaved sound.

member.name: FSBANK_SUBSOUND.fileDataLengths
member.summary: List of file data lengths corresponding to the items in the FSBANK_SUBSOUND::fileData list.

member.name: FSBANK_SUBSOUND.numFiles
member.summary: Number of items in either FSBANK_SUBSOUND::fileData / FSBANK_SUBSOUND::fileDataLengths or FSBANK_SUBSOUND::fileNames.

member.name: FSBANK_SUBSOUND.overrideFlags
member.summary: Flags that will reverse the equivalent flags passed to FSBank_Build.

member.name: FSBANK_SUBSOUND.overrideQuality
member.summary: Override the quality setting passed to FSBank_Build.

member.name: FSBANK_SUBSOUND.desiredSampleRate
member.summary: Resample to this sample rate (ignores optimize sample rate setting), up to 192000Hz.

member.name: FSBANK_SUBSOUND.percentOptimizedRate
member.summary: If using FSBANK_BUILD_OPTIMIZESAMPLERATE, this is the percentage of that rate to be used, up to 100.0%.
